channel.title: Belgian prisoner hurt by a carrot in his ass
channel.description:
A belgian detainee who hasn't got anything against anal penetration but got mad of the gasping in his neck, has put a carrot in his anus. Bad idea, because the man had to be transported to the hospital. The man has written a letter to the other prisoners to explain the situation, because he wanted to prevent rumors going around, just so others knew what happend. The prisoner, a passionate SMer, kept the carrot inside for 3 days. When the pain got too much, he was transported to the first aid in a hospital in Hasselt. According to the man, who has a carrot fetish, the specialist had two work for two hours with all kinds of tools to extract the carrot from his rectum.
Translated from: [url=http://frontpage.fok.nl/nieuws/118006/-Gevangene-gewond-door-wortel-in-kont.html]http://frontpage.fok.nl/nieuws/118006/-Gevangene-gewond-door-wortel-in-kont.html[/url] Only in belgium...
